description:
Days away from the gym are no reason to slack on finger training. The Light Rail portable hangboard has a piece of cordalette integrated into it so you can hang it anywhere with just a carabiner or quickdraw. Use it as your gym-away-from home or to warm up for your mega-proj at the boulders or crag.

  • Made of fine-grain wood that doesn't shred your skin
  • Reversible design provides 2 different sized edges and 2 jugs
  • 4 screw holes and screws allow for mounting options
name: Metolius Light Rail Hangboard
